system.description:
At 11th level, you can read your enemies like a book. You can use a bonus action to make an Intelligence (Investigation) check against the Maneuver DC of a creature you have spent at least one round observing in combat. If you succeed, choose three of the following items to learn about the creature: Armor Class, vulnerabilities , resistances , immunities , weakest saving throw , or highest ability score. At the narratorâ€™s discretion, you might learn other pertinent details of its combat abilities.

After you use this feature on a creature, you cannot attempt it against the same creature until you finish a short or long rest .
